title: Blended Research-Based Educational Design for Developing Nursing Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge and experience in digital information retrieval
context.additional_context: A VR simulation and mixed-methods research-based information literacy enhancement program for practicing nurses

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate reliable nursing-related information with 90% accuracy in a clinical scenario-based VR environment.
Learners can systematically collect materials required for evidence-based practice (EBP) within three days by applying information retrieval strategies.
Learners can establish and implement a continuous learning plan through self-assessment of information literacy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
